channel.title: ux on The Unhandled Exception Podcast
channel.description: Recent content in ux on The Unhandled Exception Podcast

item.title: Episode 28: UX with Jessica Engström
item.description: In this episode, I was joined by Jessica Engström to chat about UX! A topic that most developers (myself included) need to be more aware of when building UIs! Jessica is also a fellow podcast host, co-hosting the awesome Coding After Work podcast! Jess’s social links Twitter LinkedIn Github Blog Links from the show Coding After Work: Podcast Twitch YouTube What is Aphantasia?
